desc: A crystal used to evolve the mock Unit based on Tilith
lore: A crystal that radiates prismatic light. It is an item required to evolve the mock Unit modeled after Tilith. The memories of the real Tilith, who was able to unleash the powers within her after a reunion with her beloved friends, are sealed within this crystal. Noel of the Summoners' Research Lab and Rhynt of the Imperial Library purified this stone, which shines brightly, pulsating with the strong will contained within.
name: Opal
